title: WATCH: Lootlove shares video of her twins’ beautiful nursery
text:
WATCH: Lootlove shares video of her twins’ beautiful nursery

TV personality Luthando “Lootlove” just gave her followers a sneak peak of her twins' cute nursery room.

TV personality Luthando “Lootlove” just gave her followers a sneak peak of her twins' cute nursery room.

Read More: PICS: Lootlove finally shares adorable snaps of her twins

Taking to her Instagram page on Thursday afternoon, Lootlove shared the video of the brand new nursery. The video featured herself, her longtime partner, rapper Reason and their daughters Zanothando and Sisizwe.

Read More: PICS: LootLove and Reason explore The Big Apple

The 30-year-old said that they called the making of the nursey the “princess” project’ and she was very skeptical about posting anything that had to do with it at first.

“The nursery, we called this project 'The princess project',” she wrote.

“I was very skeptical and didn’t want to share anything on the socials and she completely understood... but my mind quickly changed as our friendship grew. She put the whole thing together, I didn’t even know you needed feeding chairs... ???? I could barely decide what colour I wanted & When we started with the practical stuff, she literally did the whole wall, put up the vynl’s from @kikkiandfranki,” explained the new mom.

“When good things happen, you really want to share! She made the whole thing happen... so here is a sneak peak... we’ve added more as time has gone but I wanted to give you an idea of how amazing this was and what was done for me... and the same could be done for you,” she added.

And indeed, the room is adorable with its cute baby furniture, cartoon characters and detailed patterns on the wall.

Check out the video below:
description: TV personality Luthando “Lootlove” just gave her followers a sneak peak of her twins' cute nursery room.
